lead_paragraph: Forget Italy's image of Catenaccio (or "door chain defence").  Antonio Conte’s Italy showed in a 2-0 defeat of Spain at Euro 2016 on Monday that they can do unchained attacking football too.
snippet: Forget Italy's image of Catenaccio (or "door chain defence").  Antonio Conte’s Italy showed in a 2-0 defeat of Spain at Euro 2016 on Monday that they can do unchained attacking football too....
